TopicTitle: What do YOU want to see in 0.24?

Articles.Content:
Hmmm...

Painting the map

Reworked Poodle, Mainsail, and a new engine with two nozzles.

Temporally-Lengthy Science Experiments

Robotic Arms

Crew moving around inside the spacecraft, but only through certain parts.

Usefulness for space stations in LKO.

Better Stock Crafts

Deadly Re-entry and better aerodynamics.

Contracts and Reputation

Money

I had a quick look but haven't seen this suggestion posted.

I'd like to see another button appear when transferring fuel for equalizing between tanks.
More IVA stuff

I'm sure I'm just seconding existing suggestions but allow me to do so:

2-meter nuclear engine, maybe a half-meter one too

3-meter stuff. At least a start, it doesn't need to be implemented all at once, but perhaps the best / most stockalike 3-meter stuff from a few mods could be adopted / adapted.

Self-illumination parts for ships. I downloaded a couple mods to do this but it'd still be nice to have by default.

Oh, and one more thing: You know how debris doesn't count toward "flights in progress" but can be toggled on in the map view? Same for flags plz, as I'm one of those players who likes to commemorate every time I land on something new and don't want to have 43579849 ships listed, 96% of which are flags.

Not in the next release but eventually - how about a career option where you balance science, money, and Kerbals toward a specific goal of Space Migration? Possibly have an Armageddon date by which time you would have to have built a viable space colony on a livable planet and transferred as many of your team there as possible.

Sort Kerbal Space Program meets RimWorld...
Performance, a lot of performance.

There's only ONE thing I really want to see:

- The focusing on objects(celestial or ships) not working when you switch to the parent body.

Description of the problem:

Whenever I go to the Mun, I like to switch my focus to the body. However, I can't then re-focus on the ship from that point. Most bodies have this problem, with Kerbin you can re-focus again above a certain altitude for example.

Don't SHIFT+TAB to switch back to the previous body if you pass your ship, there is the risk that you will throtle up.

Forgot before!

Manipulable asteroids, like we heard about today with the NASA collaboration.

Also, RESOURCES.
Mining, i want to see, mining, even though they said no

I would like to see the planets having a tilt. To make landing more of a challenge, imagine Val rotating retrograde like Venus does, or a pole close to where the equator is on some planets like Uranus's near 90 degree tilt. Also one of the moon of Jool rotating retrograde around it, maybe bop since it could be a captured asteroid. As for science I would like to see a medical exam when the kerbal returns from orbit, perhaps some tweaks required for further safe exploration. For example you do a suborbital or single orbit flight when you start the game, collect science about the reaction of the kerbal's body and then use that research to create a safer capsule for longer duration flights. Perhaps a resource like elements that can be recovered to create atomic fuels, so say two trips to Duna and back allows you to make enough fuel to go to Dres or Mojo one way on a stock atomic engine. The basic idea being collect resources, spend money and get a fuel that makes the ISP double, repeat this till you get to Pol. Finally I will ask for this every update till I see it, a ringed planet.
